PHRASE.LANG: Welcome to the Gothic Manor, where it’s always midnight and the moon is constantly hovering in the starry night sky. You’ll enjoy the Manor's dark Victorian style themes such as the grand ballroom on the grand floor, and a first story balcony that overlooks an outside courtyard, complete with its own man-made pond. Reward your guests with a Gothic Manor Goblet item, exclusive to Gothic Manor personal space. [#Legal]

Bienvenue au Manoir Gothique, où l'horloge sonne toujours les douze coups de minuit, et où la lune éclaire toujours le ciel étoilé de sa douce lumière inquiétante. Vous aimerez le style Victorien sombre du Manoir avec sa grande salle de bal, son balcon qui donne sur une cour extérieure, et son étang artificiel. Récompensez vos clients avec un élément de coupe Manoir gothique, gothique, exclusif à Manor espace personnel. [#Legal]

Willkommen in der Gotik-Villa. Hier währt ewige Nacht und der Mond leuchtet stets hell am Firmament. Der düstere, viktorianische Stil der Villa wird dir sicher gefallen. Es gibt einen großen Ballsaal und einen Balkon, von dem aus man einen schönen Ausblick auf den Hof hat. Hier befindet sich sogar ein künstlicher Teich. [#Legal]

Benvenuti nel maniero gotico, dove è sempre notte e dove la luna domina costantemente il cielo stellato. Lasciati conquistare dallo stile vittoriano un po' dark del maniero. Scegli tra i seguenti temi: l'incantevole sala da ballo o il balcone che si affaccia sul cortile esterno, con tanto di stagno realizzato a mano. [#Legal]

Bienvenido a la Mansión gótica, donde siempre es medianoche y la Luna domina el cielo nocturno perpetuamente. Disfruta del siniestro estilo victoriano de la casa, como la gran sala de baile y la balconada con vistas al exterior. No falta ni un estanque artificial. [#Legal]

Welcome to the Gothic Manor, where it’s always midnight and the moon is constantly hovering in the starry night sky. You’ll enjoy the Manor's dark Victorian style themes such as the grand ballroom on the first floor, and a second story balcony that overlooks an outside courtyard, complete with its own man-made pond. [#Legal]
언제나 시계바늘이 자정을 가리키고, 별이 빛나는 하늘에 가운데 홀로 달이 떠 있는 고딕풍 영지에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 영지의 어두운 빅토리아 시대 테마를 만나 보십시오. 일층에는 그랜드 볼룸이, 이층에는 정원을 바라보는 발코니가, 그리고 정원에는 인공호수가 마련되어 있습니다. [#Legal]

Welcome to the Gothic Manor, where it’s always midnight and the moon is constantly hovering in the starry night sky. You’ll enjoy the Manor's dark Victorian style themes such as the grand ballroom on the first floor, and a second story balcony that overlooks an outside courtyard, complete with its own man-made pond. [#Legal]
歡迎來到這個哥德式莊園，一個總是停在午夜時刻，月亮在滿天星斗的夜空中不斷徘徊的空間。您可以享受莊園的黑暗維多利亞風格主題，如一樓的大宴會廳。而二樓的陽台，可俯瞰外面擁有一個人造池塘的庭院。 [#Legal]
